tool.name: Scanpy RunFDG
tool.description: visualise cell clusters using force-directed graph
tool.command: ln -s '${input_obj_file}' input.h5 && PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 scanpy-cli embed fdg --use-graph '${use_graph}' --key-added '${key_added}' #if $embeddings --export-embedding embeddings.csv #end if #if $settings.default == "false" --random-state ${settings.random_seed} --layout ${settings.layout} #if $settings.init_pos --init-pos '${settings.init_pos}' #end if #end if @INPUT_OPTS@ @OUTPUT_OPTS@

param.name: use_graph
param.label: Name of the slot that holds the KNN graph

param.name: key_added
param.label: Additional suffix to the name of the slot to save the embedding

param.name: init_pos
param.label: Method to initialise embedding, any key for adata.obsm or choose from the preset methods

param.name: random_seed
param.label: Seed for numpy random number generator
